Package org.jlab.analysis

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigVar
    Cut Interface for lambda expressions to cut kinematic variables.
    SIDISVar Interface for lambda expressions to compute kinematic quantities from a list of particles organized by the given decay chain pids.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Analysis Encapsulates some common analysis procedures.
    Constants Sets the Lund pid to particle mass/charge/name hashmaps and other analysis constants.
    DecayProduct Adds (essentially) time vertex, chi2pid, and status attributes to the standard Particle class minus some problematic methods for groovy as well as less used methods.
    Decays Searches a hipo event for all unique decay combinations for a given set of Lund pids.
    ExtendedConstants Sets the Lund pid to particle mass/charge/name hashmaps and other analysis constants.
    FiducialCuts Implements Stefan Diehl's (sdiehl@jlab.org) fiducial cuts: version 7/23/2020.
    Kinematics Encapsulates some of the more common SIDIS kinematics calculations.
    MCDecays Searches a hipo event for all unique MC::Lund decays for a given set of Lund pids.
    Main
    Parser Encapsulates most of the command line parsing and messaging for the Analysis class.
